1.0.name: wordpress/wp-subpages
1.0.description: WP Subpages Widget is a simple plugin to allow for multiple instances to show child pages. For people who use multiple template files for each of their site's pages, having the capability of using a widget, rather than hardcode subpages of a parent or child page.
